World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 1 月 29 日星期一 11:33:03 PM 120
Second man jailed in Moldova's 'fraud of the century'A Moldovan court jailed a banker for 10 years on Monday, the second man to be sentenced in connection with the ex-Soviet state's "fraud of the century" in which $1 billion was removed from the banking system and taken out of the country. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 22:40:17 GMT CNRUZHZRRFL5RLKS4URIGI4JCM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/second-man-jailed-moldova-fraud- century-2024-01-29/Alexander Tanas世界欧洲
Youngest US soldier killed in Jordan drone attack was 23The U.S. military on Monday released the names of the three Army Reserve soldiers killed in Sunday's drone attack by Iran-backed militants in Jordan, with the youngest victim just 23 years old. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 22:18:55 GMT QBJEWZZ2H5MBLK2BKUQR3VUCY https://www.reuters.com/world/youngest-us-soldier-killed-jordan-drone-attack-was-23-2024-01-29/Reuters世界
Complaint alleges Harvard didn't protect pro-Palestinian students from threatsOver a dozen students alleged on Monday that Harvard University failed to protect them from harassment and threats "based solely" on their pro-Palestinian identity, the group representing them said. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 22:17:12 GMT V5KXPRFTNNNMJCUCP3F2FCCUNQ https://www.reuters.com/world/complaint-alleged-harvard-did-not-protect-pro-palestinian-students-threats-2024-01-29/Kanishka Singh世界
Canada to further delay assisted death based solely on mental illnessThe Canadian government on Monday said people suffering solely from mental illness will remain excluded from pursuing assisted death for an unspecified period after a parliamentary committee concluded the country's healthcare system was not yet ready. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 21:47:23 GMT B5ALQSJ2EZKP5NBYZMHKUJ2UIA https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/canada-keep-mental-illness-excluded-assistance-death-law-2024-01-29/Ismail Shakil世界美洲
Colombia, ELN rebels extend ceasefire with view toward longer renewalThe government of Colombia and the National Liberation Army (ELN) rebels said on Monday they would extend a bilateral ceasefire for seven days while they finish evaluating a much longer extension to the measure. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 21:38:17 GMT EMSJSUG4TBIWZG7NWES3WQYJFI https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/colombia-eln-rebels-extend-ceasefire-with-view-toward-longer-renewal-2024-01-29/Reuters世界美洲
Canada drops weapons export controls to Turkey, including drone technologyCanada on Monday said it had dropped weapons export controls to Turkey, including drone optical technology, according to a notice posted online, saying that from now on it would review all exports on a case-by-case basis. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 21:31:11 GMT 3LDK6AEIW5N23PKAE3BDDPTOAM https://www.reuters.com/world/canada-drops-weapons-export-controls-turkey-include-drone-technology-2024-01-29/Reuters世界
Who is Kataib Hezbollah, the group blamed for killing US troops?The U.S. believes the attack that killed three U.S. troops on the Jordanian-Syrian border has the "footprints" of Iran-backed Iraqi militia Kataib Hezbollah, the Pentagon said. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 21:27:28 GMT IXFZGCG2RNKSRC7LWN7D6PYNA https://www.reuters.com/world/who-is-kataib-hezbollah-group-blamed-for-killing-us-troops-2024-01-29/Reuters世界
Peru protests block access to Machu Picchu, stranding touristsProtests in Peru are blocking access to Machu Picchu, one of South America's most popular heritage sites, with local anger over a new ticketing system halting rail transport to the iconic Incan site and leaving some tourists stranded. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 21:22:48 GMT 3XIMATKAAVMKBIUULBTNK7PI3A https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/peru-protests-block-access-to-machu-picchu-stranding-tourists-2024-01-29/Lucinda Elliott世界美洲
EU envoys back setting aside Russian asset profits for UkraineEuropean Union members agreed unanimously on Monday to set aside billions of euros of windfall profits from Russian central bank assets frozen in Europe, the first step of a plan to help fund Ukraine reconstruction after Russia's invasion. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 20:39:04 GMT 2PUZK7DJKBOZXD7LTUR23ORMGQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-exports-back-setting-aside- Russian-asset-profits-ukraine-2024-01-29/Reuters世界欧洲
ECOWAS chair Nigeria slams juntas' move to quit blocNigeria on Monday said the "unelected" military authorities in Niger, Mali, and Burkina Faso were letting their people down with their joint decision to leave the Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS). Mon, 29 Jan 2024 19:47:56 GMT BBLOUZROCK3DNZHT4DWSOCTDM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/mali-notizes-west-african-bloc-ecowas-decision-to-leave-2024-01-29/Reuters世界非洲
Israel's military keeps focus on southern Gaza's Khan Younis -spokespersonIsrael's military said on Monday it will keep pressure on the city of Khan Younis in the southern Gaza Strip, which for weeks has been the focus of Israel's offensive, and said it has killed more than 2,000 Palestinian militants there. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 19:20:59 GMT SCU7HV3ATNP4XECAHCCSZZNHIQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-military-keeps-focus-southern-gaza-khan-younis-spokesperson-2024-01-29/Reuters世界中东地区
